sentences.en: Fortunately the gunman's shots went astray.
sentences.cn: 幸好持枪歹徒把子弹打偏了。

sentences.en: I was late, but fortunately the meeting hadn't started.
sentences.cn: 我迟到了，不过幸好会议还没有开始。

sentences.en: Fortunately the short delay gave him time to gather himself.
sentences.cn: 幸运的是，这短暂的拖延给了他喘息的时间。
